info.name: DAPEN IAM Service
info.description:
Complete API collection for DAPEN IAM Service — multi-tenant Identity and Access Management.

## Authentication
Most endpoints require a JWT Bearer token. Tokens are obtained via the OTP-based login flow.
Protected endpoints that are product-scoped also require X-Tenant-ID header.

## Registration Flow
```
INITIATE → PENDING_VERIFICATION → VERIFIED → PASSWORD_SET → COMPLETED
```

## Login Flow (OTP-based passwordless)
```
EMAIL → OTP_REQUIRED → OTP_VERIFIED → TOKENS_ISSUED
```

## Participant Lifecycle
```
DRAFT → PENDING_APPROVAL → APPROVED | REJECTED
```

## Member Lifecycle
```
PENDING_APPROVAL → ACTIVE | REJECTED
```
